timeline.message:
Store the expression type on ExpressionInfo

Storing this information will allow documentation extraction tools to properly order expressions.

Implement getters to properly expose Syntax Element information

This change introduces more consistency for documentation extraction tools.

Implement getters to expose information from Event Values

This change introduces more consistency for documentation extraction tools.

Implement getter to expose Event Values given a time

This change introduces more consistency for documentation extraction tools.

Implement getters to properly expose syntax Language information

This change introduces more consistency for documentation extraction tools.

Implement getters to properly expose Function parameter information

This change introduces more consistency for documentation extraction tools.
Properly copy arrays when exposing them with getters

timeline.bodyText: return should be on its own line
